title: Huntworth Hunting Muff
features: This hunting muff in Hidd’n camo has all of the best features of the traditional muff and more
Goes beyond the standard with a warm plush fleece shell lined with thick fleece and poly fill insulation
We’ve also added a center front zipper pocket for storage and an adjustable waist strap for a just-right fit
With Hidd’n camo on one side and blaze on the other, you can keep using this muff when blaze is required
With Hidd’n camo on one side and blaze on the other, you can keep using this muff when blaze is required
description: Huntworth started out in 2001 as a glove company and built our reputation on the fit and performance of our gloves. Today Huntworth has a full line of clothing and accessories with the goal to provide quality gloves and apparel for passionate hunters at a price they can afford. Our attention to detail and drive to offer items that are built to last is easy to recognize in the Huntworth product line.Huntworth pushes the boundaries of camouflage design with its own line of unique camo patterns to help hunters outwit the eyes of big game. Our digital pattern,
, is extremely popular with both deer hunters and Western game hunters who demand a pattern that helps them disappear in any terrain. Our

is an all-purpose pattern. It combines photographic depth with organically placed detail, making the pattern both open to be visible from a distance and broken up so you can easily blend into your surroundings.
Huntworth Men's Mid Weight, Fleece Lined, Waterproof Hunting Muff, Hidd'n Camo/Blaze

For generations, hunters have used muffs to keep their hands warm and nimble so they have perfect control when it's time to strike. This hunting muff has all of the best features of the traditional muff and more. It goes beyond the standard with a warm high density fleece shell lined with thick wet print fleece and poly fill insulation. We’ve also added a center front zipper pocket for storage and an adjustable waist strap for a just-right fit.This isn’t your grandfather’s hunting muff.
